meanings.definition: People who lead others into excessive indulgence in sensual pleasures.
meanings.sent1: The debauchers at the party encouraged everyone to drink and dance all night.
meanings.sent2: She was known as one of the debauchers in town, always organizing wild parties.
meanings.sent3: The debauchers decided to throw a lavish feast to celebrate their friend's birthday.
meanings.sent4: The debauchers were like pied pipers, luring everyone into their world of excess.
meanings.sent5: The image of the debauchers laughing and dancing in the moonlight was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: To lead someone into excessive indulgence in sensual pleasures.
meanings.sent1: He debauchers his friends by convincing them to skip work and go to the beach.
meanings.sent2: The charismatic influencer debauchers her followers with luxurious lifestyle posts.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat debauchers the dog into chasing its tail around the house.
meanings.sent4: The hypnotic music debauchers the listeners into a trance-like state.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cookies debauchers the senses, making it impossible to resist.
